Plan a Crypto Mine Near a U.S. Military Base? Expect a Bigger Hassle Now. https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/11/01/plan-a-crypto-mine-near-a-us-military-base-expect-a-bigger-hassle-now/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source =rss&utm_campaign=头条新闻OLG5HSS3HZA7TIZT6TD5H2BWUE Jesse HamiltonForeign real estate deals near sensitive U.S. military bases will get more government scrutiny under a new rule from the U.S. Department of the Treasury that has emerged after President Joe Biden ordered a China-tied crypto mining operation beside a Wyoming nuclear missile base shut down earlier this year. Bitcoin Mining Bans Can Backfire on Climate Conscious Governments, a New Research Finds https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/11/01/bitcoin-mining-bans-can-backfire-on-climate-cious-governments-a-new-research-finds/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign =头条新闻QLJM4GFWYNB3LDXGD25EJ3G4UE Tom CarrerasThe intensive energy usage of the Bitcoin network could tempt governments to ban mining due to environmental concerns. A new research paper indicates that could be a mistake, depending on the jurisdiction.
